name: Eubert 2 Must Die
description:
When Daniel finds out his favorite retro game, Eubert, is getting a modern reboot, he's livid! He's convinced it can't be good, and will ruin the name and memory of his childhood precious. So he sets out to leave a glitch in every level of the game, ruining it for anyone who might not be as smart as he is and might actually enjoy it.

You are Daniel. Play through Eubert 2 and leave glitches in each level. Make it to the end to ensure no one gets to enjoy the travesty. Because, as everyone as bright as Daniel knows, nothing stays around forever, not even his favorite game.

Game supports keyboard, mouse, and gamepad controls in multiple layouts, as well as custom remapping of individual buttons to your liking. It auto-saves whenever you reach a new level, so you can continue where you left off later.

Due to the time constraints of the Weekly Game Jam, it only has 8 levels -- but that means you should be able to see the ending cutscene :)
